LanguageData.Plant_Daylily.label: daylily
LanguageData.Plant_Daylily.description: A cultivated flower with wide petals and a short lifespan. Daylilies are very beautiful, but must be replanted often.
LanguageData.Plant_Rose.label: rose
LanguageData.Plant_Rose.description: A beautiful cultivated flower, the rose has been a symbol of love since Earth's ancient era.
